review.reviewBody: Everything was really good! Big portion sizes so I have enough for 2 meals. The C3. Grilled Chicken Fillet, Fried Roll香茅燒雞扒, 春卷飯 was delicious and so flavorful.
the noodles were mushy, beef was tough they didn't give any Basil or Cilantro, the broth was good though and the previous time I ordered from here it was good so I'm not sure what happened this time

Restaurant disabled special requests option. I would've asked for no bean sprouts, lime, and sauce but was unable to. Unfortunately, those items went to waste. Would also be nice to have the option to ask for the steak pieces to be cooked- instead, I had to order a bowl without the raw steak.
pho was good, bread on chicken sandwich was stale but good other than that

Lemongrass chicken is always a good choice. This place has some of the best Vietnamese food in Richmond IMO. I wish you could omit more items. Like the sides of fish sauce. They always just get wasted for me.
